subtask.title: Identify Alternative AI Systems and Their Characteristics
subtask.objective: Identify other common AI systems (e.g., rule-based systems, supervised learning models, conversational agents) and understand their features and typical applications.
subtask.scope: Literature review comparing different AI system types.

verification.completion_summary: The research findings primarily focus on AI agents, including types, architectures, and deployment aspects, but do not explicitly cover other common AI systems such as rule-based systems or supervised learning models. The scope is narrowly centered on AI agents and related architectures, rather than a broad comparison of different AI system types.
missing_requirements: Identification and comparison of other common AI systems beyond agents
Features and typical applications of rule-based systems, supervised learning models, conversational agents
Broader literature review covering the full scope of AI system types
